context.description: This command navigates to the tests that reference this Java element.
Toggles the filtering of the stack trace entries as defined in the JUnit preference page.
This launch configuration runs JUnit tests.

This command launches JUnit tests. When a class is selected its tests are run. When a project, package or source folder is selected then all contained tests are run. When a single test method is selected then the selected test is run.
This command copies the stack trace to the clipboard.
This command opens the corresponding test case.
This commands opens the corresponding test method.
Locks the test result view so that the currently executed tests isn't automatically revealed.
This view displays the test results.
This wizard helps you to create a new test case and to generate test stubs for existing methods.
This wizard helps you to create a new test case and to generate test stubs for existing methods.
This wizard helps you to create a new test suite.
This tab allows you to specify JUnit tests to be executed.
This dialog compares the expected with the actual test result in a text compare view.
This page is where you can set JUnit preferences.
